summary:
Biopharmaceutical leader with outstanding track record in developing early- and late-stage microbial and mammalian processes to manufacture drug substance and drug product, including multiple marketed biologics. Effective communicator who collaborates across functional areas. Key strengths include solving technical challenges leading to improved manufacturing processes, recruiting and developing high-performing teams, and implementing new technologies on budget and on time.

•	Cell culture, fermentation and recovery processes
•	Process development and characterization
•	Media and feed development
•	Technology transfer, manufacturing support and CMO oversight
•	Validation, life cycle changes and product comparability
•	Authoring of IND, CTA, BLA and MAA CMC sections

currentPositions.description: Responsible for process development and manufacturing of biologics used to make antibody-oligonucleotide conjugates..
currentPositions.title: Senior Director

educations.degree: Master of Science in Chemical Engineering Practice
